predicate.note: Frames file for 'dedicate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: intend to use for some purpose

example.name: passivized
example.text: Ted Eubank, Coda's president, said the loan carries an interest rate of prime plus one percentage point, with [85% of the company's net oil and gas revenue each month]-1 dedicated *trace*-1 to repayment.

example.name: active
example.text: John dedicated all his energy to tormenting Mary.

roleset.note: Avoid adjectival usages like "a dedicated lover".
